// dictionary
        const dict = new Map([
            ['NavBar',              NavBar              ],
            ['CubeRowCard',         CubeRowCard         ],
            ['OnOffSetCube',        OnOffSetCube        ],
            ['NumberSetCube',       NumberSetCube       ],
            ['TextSetCube',         TextSetCube         ],
            ['NumberReadCube',      NumberReadCube      ],
            ['TimeStampReadCube',   TimeStampReadCube   ],
            ['UrlLaunchCube',       UrlLaunchCube       ],
            ['TextReadCube',        TextReadCube        ],
            ['ImageReadCube',       ImageReadCube       ],
            ['HeartbeatCube',       HeartbeatCube       ],
            ['LabelReadCube',       LabelReadCube       ],
            ['StateChoiceCube',     StateChoiceCube     ],
            ['StateToggleCube',     StateToggleCube     ],
            ['DropChoiceCube',      DropChoiceCube      ],
            ['SettingIncrCube',     SettingIncrCube     ],
            ['GaugeCube',           GaugeCube           ],
            ['HbarCube',            HbarCube            ],
            ['BinaryFlagCube',      BinaryFlagCube      ],
            ['ArchivePlotCard',     ArchivePlotCard     ],
            ['TimePlotCard',        TimePlotCard        ],
            ['XyPlotCard',          XyPlotCard          ],
            ['BarPlotCard',         BarPlotCard         ],
            ['VectorPlotCard',      VectorPlotCard      ],
            ['IframeCard',          IframeCard          ],
            ['CustomCard',          CustomCard          ],
            ['UserCard',            UserCard            ]]);

        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
        <meta name="description" content="">
        <meta name="author" content="">

        <link rel="icon" href="{{{payload.appConfig.faviconUrl}}}" type="image/x-icon">

        <!-- Bootstrap Core CSS -->
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="/homepage/css/bootstrap.min.css" type="text/css">

        <!-- Custom Fonts -->
        <link href='https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
        <link href='https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Merriweather:400,300,300italic,400italic,700,700italic,900,900italic' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="/homepage/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css" type="text/css">

        <!-- Plugin CSS -->

        <!-- Custom CSS -->

{{{payload.main_css}}}
